marklogic.body: I remember when I first read this post I thought, "Sarah is so Spot on!" Again, after re-reading it, the ripple effect is extremely strong. I'd also add that coffee meetings are a setting to bond over hardships. I found it enjoyable to meet with an entrepreneur, and once a certain zone was , someone would say "I'm struggling with X" and the other person's eyes lit up as they said "Me too!" I would have some of the most productive and inspiring conversation/brainstorm sessions after that zone was Reached. And it remains with me to this day.
